instruction: Explore the interactive exhibit available in our previous blog post that illustrates the median five-year implied probability of default (PD) changes based on three Network for Greening the Financial System (NGFS) scenarios. Examine how each driver contributes to the change and determine which scenario has the largest contribution from policy risk.
output: Thank you for your interest in our previous blog post. The interactive exhibit available shows the median five-year implied probability of default (PD) changes for investment-grade (IG) and high-yield (HY) corporate-bond issuers based on three NGFS scenarios: “Net Zero 2050,” “Below 2⁰C,” and “Nationally Determined Contributions.” According to the exhibit, the “Net Zero 2050 (Average Extreme Weather)” scenario has the largest contribution from policy risk. We encourage you to further explore the exhibit to gain a better understanding of how each scenario impacts the median PD changes.
